nodes.bodyText:
We search for the view in the mActivity which is PlaybackOverlayActivity. This inflates the activity_playback_overlay layout. This uses the CustomPlaybackOverlayFragment fragment (at this point I'm wondering why it doesn't use this instead of mActivity) which inflates vlc_player_interface.
I can't find where it exactly initializes the XML but the only file containing an id guideCurrentTitle was overlay_tv_guide so I adjusted the XML in that file.
TL;DR:: everything should be set for those 2
I don't see it there, or am I misunderstanding this?
You're right, I somehow missed that 2 times lol
